bwwExcerpt: As in Simon and Marvin Hamlisch's 'They're Playing Our Song,' Aaron's and Casey's friends keep popping out of the furniture to give them foolish advice, which they mostly ignore. Casey's best friend (gay, of course) keeps phoning for an update, and boy is he frustrated when she doesn't pick up. 'First Date' is harmless and instantly forgettable.
